title: Nightmares from the Deep The Cursed Heart CE MULTi12-PROPHET
description:
Nightmares from the Deep: The Cursed Heart CE
(c) Artifex Mundi

release date ...: March 2767
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/PT/BR/KR/JP/CN

Find  the  missing  woman  lost  in  a   mysterious
Carnival of Horrors in Dark Arcana:  The  Carnival.
Investigate two worlds: the one  you  know  and  an
alternate  plane  existing  behind  the   Hall   of
Mirrors. There you'll discover  the  secret  of  an
ancient being known as the Evil One. Travel through
dimensions,  reveal  the  story   of   star-crossed
lovers, and stop the Evil  One  from  breaking  its
magical chains  and  invading  our  world  in  this
exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
It's the new version form Steam with some fixes
and improvements (like achievments added).
